description: This file demonstrates how to use the ZoomTools class for managing Zoom meetings, including setting up credentials, creating an agent with Zoom capabilities, and providing instructions for various Zoom API operations.

classes.name: ZoomTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for managing Zoom meetings via the Zoom API.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that can perform tasks using tools and language models.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing an OpenAI chat model used within the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the agent to output a response based on a prompt.
